contenido: I am a psychologist with a passion for social transformation through employability and promoting a work culture based on empathy and collaboration. My journey into psychology began as a salaried worker, where I experienced the importance of human connection in work environments

My commitment to employability goes beyond job search; it is a personal mission to inspire a less individualistic society. I believe in selfless help and giving back to society. My experience as a volunteer at the Dravet Syndrome Association has taught me the power of togetherness and gJanuarysity, lessons that I apply in my approach to psychology and human resources.

My goal is to create a work environment where empathy is the foundation and where each individual success contributes to the collective well-being. In my quest for my first professional experience, I am eager to apply my skills and values to facilitate employability and foster a chain of kindness and goodness in society. Together, we can make work a positive force that transforms lives and communities!
- Support in the organisation of events
